purpose: The email serves as a call for participation in CONFEST 2025, inviting attendees to register for the event and highlighting key details such as the early registration deadline and the conferences being held. It provides information about the dates, location, invited speakers, and workshops associated with the event.
evidence_sentences: We are excited to invite you to register for CONFEST 2025, which will host three major international conferences.
The early registration deadline is July 25, 2025.
These events will take place in Aarhus, Denmark, from August 25 to August 30.
For more information about the conferences and the venue, please visit: https://conferences.au.dk/confest2025
We hope to meet you in Aarhus this summer!
